properties.name: 1st Apartment in Seattle
properties.description: Posted by GlenncanonTechnically Kent, but nobody knows where that is. This was a decent apartment on the third floor. On a clear day you could see the very top of Mt. Ranier from the Balcony. But there was a mangy, flea-bitten cat that belonged to the people next door, who once locked their 9-year old daughter out of the house.

properties.name: 2nd Apartment in Seattle
properties.description: Posted by GlenncanonNice first floor apartment with a patio that had a small duck pond behind it. This is where I was when I experienced my first earthquake.

properties.name: Apartment #1
properties.description: Posted by GlenncanonApartment #1Lived here by myself for the first year. Riddled with cock roaches.

properties.name: Apartment #2
properties.description: Posted by GlenncanonLived here with Darren Goad, who is now a clown in London, and with T. Clark Miller, who is doing G-d knows what.

properties.name: Apartment #3
properties.description: Posted by GlenncanonAbilene, TexasLived here with Justin McKean. It was a one-bedroom apartment, so didn\'t have a lot of privacy. Fortunately, I worked all night at the Campus Police Station.

properties.name: Birth Place
properties.description: Posted by GlenncanonArtesia, NM. I believe the arrow points to the church of Christ my dad was preaching at when I was born. Lived here about six months before we moved on to Houston, Texas. Next time I went through was in Winter, 2003 on my way back to Fort Sill, OK from Seattle, WA.

properties.name: Central Arkansas Christian
properties.description: Posted by GlenncanonAttended this school in seventh and eighth grade. Had a lot of fun, made a lot of mistakes.

properties.name: Corner of Sea King & Sea Queen
properties.description: Posted by GlenncanonFirst house I remember. I remember an electrocuted rat in the kitchen. Boarding up the windows for a hurricane. I remember a weeping willow tree. I remember our first dog, Bootsie.

properties.name: First Apartment
properties.description: Posted by GlenncanonSpent the first year here.

properties.name: First House in Corpus
properties.description: Posted by GlenncanonIt\'s either this house or the one south of it. I remember the basketball goal, the banana tree in the corner of the yard; I remember my cousin Terry visiting us.

properties.name: First Kiss
properties.description: Posted by GlenncanonFirst kissed the wife here.

properties.name: Geyer Springs Church of Christ
properties.description: Posted by GlenncanonWhere dad preached. Sigh. The less said the better, I guess.

properties.name: Geyer Springs Elementary
properties.description: Posted by GlenncanonWent here 1 month of Second and all third grade. Looks like they\'ve built an entirely knew building. Got into my first and only school fight here. Our assistant principal died of pneumonia.

properties.name: Heights Church of Christ
properties.description: Posted by GlenncanonThis is where Pop preached. Old building when we were there. Looks like they\'ve added some to it. Never been back. I remember the balcony, the old ladies and Marshall, the custodian.

properties.name: Holliday, Texas
properties.description: Posted by GlenncanonWent to high school in this town.

properties.name: House On Primrose Drive
properties.description: Posted by GlenncanonOne of these houses in the middle of the block was ours. Older house, small backyard, honeysuckle along the fence separating our house from the couple that had the beautiful Irish Setter. Alleyway ran behind the house.

properties.name: House on Western Lane
properties.description: Posted by Glenncanon5505 Western Lane. Where I had my first dog. Had a basketball goal out front. Dad built a deck out back. We had wild blackberry bushes along the back fence and mom would make blackberry crunch.

properties.name: Hyatt Coconut Plantation
properties.description: Posted by GlenncanonThis is where we own a time share.

properties.name: Kris and Curt's first Apartment
properties.description: Posted by GlenncanonTiny, tiny place. Bit of a shotgun shack.

properties.name: Lakeside City, TX
properties.description: Posted by GlenncanonLived here during my high school years. The Dark Spot of my universe.

properties.name: Meadowbrook Elementary School
properties.description: Posted by Glenncanon Attended a little bit of Kindergarten year here. We were the Beavers, I believe. I remember being called a punk by a fat third grader on my first day; I remember breaking my collar bone falling from the monkey bars; I remember learning to read and write.

properties.name: Multi-Purpose Building/CAC GS Elementary
properties.description: Posted by GlenncanonWent to school here from fourth through sixth. Where I met Doug, and Kizer and Mike.

properties.name: OEF VI
properties.description: Posted by GlenncanonLived in this general area for about a year.

properties.name: Our Apartment On Lunt
properties.description: Posted by GlenncanonThis was a great vintage apartment on the third floor, corner, with French windows and hardwood floors. Loved this place. A block from the lake, two blocks from the El.

properties.name: Peppermint Park
properties.description: Posted by GlenncanonAccording to a June 1973 issue of Texas Monthly, this is where the small amusement park was located. I remember it being the shangra-la of a three-year old boy.

properties.name: Reunited!
properties.description: Posted by GlenncanonThis is where Kris & I lived after we got back together.

properties.name: Sewell Theatre
properties.description: Posted by Glenncanon First met my wife here.

properties.name: Third Apartment
properties.description: Posted by GlenncanonLived here after I returned from Afghanistan.

properties.name: Third Place in Seattle
properties.description: Posted by GlenncanonThird Place in SeattlePretty sure this is it, though it may be one block north. Great neighborhood. Wouldn\'t mind moving back to this area someday. It would be nice to live in Seattle under happier circumstances than we managed the first time. This is where we lived when I went off to join the Army.

properties.name: Third place in Seattle
properties.description: Posted by GlenncanonLittle house. didn\'t stay long. Not a very pleasant place, though Kris did a lot for the back yard. I remember watching a hornet\'s next being built in the big tree in the front yard. A Candian couple bought the house from our Landlord, but we were glad to get out.

properties.name: Where Kris worked.
properties.description: Posted by GlenncanonThis building is adjacent to the convention center. Nice looking modern architecture. She worked for a capital venture firm for several years. This is where she was when the earthquake struck.

properties.name: Windsor Park Church of Christ
properties.description: Posted by GlenncanonThis is where Pop preached. I remember a song leader that looked like John Denver. I remember a kid at the church that killed a young boy. I remember Bible Hour and splitting my head open on the floor.
